title: Return of the Pirates of the Future
text:
Fatima’s impressions:

interesting puzzles (almost no locks)
auditory puzzle

title: Steampunk Adventure
text:
Fatima’s impressions:

some puzzles were removed from the sequence, but not from the room
there were a few of super frustrating puzzles that didn’t work quite well

title: The Extremist
text:
Fatima’s impressions:

a lot of locks without clear indication of which solution is for which lock
overall, hints about where clues are found were not always super clear
colour puzzle that is very hard to solve without additional light source

title: Marien Muotokuvat
text:
Fatima’s impressions:

a lot of interesting puzzles!
some puzzles require objects to be constructed by hand

title: Indiana Jones and the Lost Temple
text:
Fatima’s impressions:

too many random objects
colour-based puzzle in a very dark room
interesting cooperation-type puzzle

title: Smugglers
text:
Fatima’s impressions:

auditory puzzle
Tampere theme

title: 221B Baker Street
text:
Fatima’s impressions:

there is a puzzle that requires immense precision (lose a lot of time)
some clues are not super intuitive (easy to get stuck thinking it is solved one way, but turns out it is solved differently)

title: Finlaysonin Sähkövalo
text:
Fatima’s impressions:

very interesting puzzles
some require a lot of physical activity
really needs 4 people
Tampere theme

title: Hanno and Fatima's Escape Rooms
text:
viewof year_filter = Inputs.form({
  beg: Inputs.number([2023, Infinity], {step: 1, label: 'From', placeholder: new Date().getFullYear(), value: 2023}), 
  end: Inputs.number([2023, Infinity], {step: 1, label: 'to', placeholder: new Date().getFullYear(), value: new Date().getFullYear()}), 
}, 
{
  template: (inputs) => htl.html`<div class="row justify-content-between no-gutters">
    <div class="col">${inputs.beg}</div>
    <div class="col">${inputs.end}</div>
    </div>`
});









filtered = transpose(data).filter(function(d) {
  return year_filter.beg <= new Date(d.date).getFullYear() && new Date(d.date).getFullYear() <= year_filter.end; 
})

width = '100%'; 
height = '500px'; 

roomMap = {
  // You'll often see Leaflet examples initializing a map like L.map('map'),
  // which tells the library to look for a div with the id 'map' on the page.
  // In Observable, we instead create a div from scratch in this cell, so it's
  // completely self-contained.
  let container = DOM.element('div', { style: `width:${width};height:${height}` });
  
  // Note that I'm yielding the container pretty early here: this allows the
  // div to be placed on the page. This is important, because Leaflet uses
  // the div's .offsetWidth and .offsetHeight to size the map. If I were
  // to only return the container at the end of this method, Leaflet might
  // get the wrong idea about the map's size.
  yield container;
  
  // Now we create a map object and add a layer to it.
  let map = L.map(container);
  let osmLayer = L.tileLayer('https://{s}.basemaps.cartocdn.com/light_all/{z}/{x}/{y}@2x.png', {
      attribution: '© <a href="http://osm.org/copyright">OpenStreetMap</a> contributors'
  }).addTo(map);
  
  var rooms = L.featureGroup(); 
  for (var i = 0; i < filtered.length; i++) {
    let room = L.marker([filtered[i].lat, filtered[i].long]); 
    room.bindPopup(filtered[i].linked_name); 
    rooms.addLayer(room);
  }
  
  map.addLayer(rooms); 
  map.fitBounds(rooms.getBounds(), {maxZoom: 7});
}

title: Der Wald
text:
Fatima’s impressions:

very immersive
one of the puzzles also requires a lot of precision

title: Star of the Theater
text:
Fatima’s impressions:

overall super interesting
maybe 90 min is a bit too long (was getting tired towards the end)
one of the clues had to be used twice!

title: Prison Break
text:
Fatima’s impressions:

needs cooperation
interesting non-lock puzzles
requires some crawling

title: Out of Mars
text:
Fatima’s impressions:

can’t remember much, but it wasn’t very interesting

It seems the company is closed by now (8 Feb 2026).

title: Mission: Mars
text:
Fatima’s impressions

not many locks, but quite a few number pads

title: The Heist
text:
Fatima’s impressions:

quite challenging
non-standard puzzles that require some physical action

title: Der letzte Seelenwanderer
text:
Fatima’s impressions:

very immersive
puzzles need to be done in very precise order
So, most of the time we spent being frustrated which puzzle to do now or being told by the game master that we are jumping too much ahead
interesting non-standard puzzles
one room

title: Näsinneula
text:
ImportantRoom is closed



Room is closed since August 2025!


Fatima’s impressions:

puzzles were slightly fiddly

locks needed some wiggling before being opened
pictures were changing a bit too fast
strong Finnish accent made it hard to understand an audio clue
